content.text: I consider entertainment may be quite varied. I mean, while some people like watching movies, others enjoy more reading a good book. As a consequence, everyone is free to do something they enjoy and decide to dedicate their time to. Some people are pretty aware of the importance of selecting their hobbies whereas others just 'go with the flow', this is a colloquial way of saying that they just let things happen to them, without having a real intention. I consider having a balance between being decisive and relaxed is the best choice. In my experience I have had hobbies that are quite entertaining as well as I have had some that ended up to be boring and it has little to do with my conscious selection of them.
